description:
Our place is close to Q, B, 2, 4, 5, Subway Trains. Milk and Honey Cafe, Newkirk Plaza where you can enjoy delicious New York Pizza at Lo Duca's. Many convenience and grocery stores, Clean Rite Center Laundry - open 24 Hours. 
You’ll love our apartment because of the neighborhood, proximity to restaurants, and nearby subway lines. It's great for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. It has everything you need to make your NY stay a memorable one!

The entire apartment is yours for the time you will be here. Please treat it like your home! :)

We are 8 mins walking distance from the Q and B Train, and 12 mins walking distance from the 2,4,5 Trains. It's very easy to get around Brooklyn and into Manhattan from our location. The B and Q trains go over the George Washington train and it's a beautiful sight of the New York City skyline!
name: Close to Train, and Clean Brooklyn One Bedroom
